name: Candy CRUNCH
description:
Sometimes you just wanna crunch some candy, not just crush it

Tower stats:

Toothpick shooter:

  • Range: 2
  • Damage: 1
  • Durability: 1
  • Attack Speed: 1.6/sec 
  • Is the only tower that can break wrappers
  • Does double damage against gumdrops and gummies

Flamethrower:

  • Range: 1
  • Damage: 1
  • Durability: 1
  • Attack Speed:  3.3/sec
  • Is the only tower that can melt chocolate barriers and choco chunks
  • Does double damage to the choco drop lord

Spoon Thrower:

  • Range: 3
  • Damage: 1
  • Durability: 3
  • Attack Speed: 1.25/sec
  • Crushes through 3 candies with every spoon!
  • Does double damage to spiral candies (but not the final boss)

Candy Types:

Basic: Drop one cash on crunch

  • Blue: 1 health
  • Green: 1 health, has a blue underneath
  • Red: 1 health, has a green underneath
  • Orange: 1 health, fast, has a red underneath
  • Purple: 1 health, slow, has three orange underneath
  • Cyan: 1 health, fast, has a purple underneath
  • Yellow: 10 health, slow, has two cyan underneath

Chocolate Barriers: Must be melted ,1 health, drop no cash

Gumdrops: Drop one cash on crunch take double damage from pierce

  • Blue: 3 health
  • Green: 3 health, has a blue underneath
  • Red: 3 health, has a green underneath
  • Orange: 3 health, fast, has a red underneath
  • Purple: 3 health, slow, has an orange underneath
  • Cyan: 3 health, fast, has a purple underneath
  • Yellow: 3 health, slow, has a cyan underneath

Wrapped Candies: Must be pierced, 1 health, drop one cash

  • Blue: Spawns 2 blue basics
  • Green: Spawns 2 green basics
  • Red: Spawns 2 red basics
  • Orange: Spawns 2 orange basics
  • Magenta: Spawns 1 purple basics AND 5 red basics
  • Teal: Spawns 2 cyan basics AND 3 green basics
  • Yellow: Spawns 2 yellow basics

Choco Chunk Candies: Must be melted, 10 health, drop ten cash on crunch

Spiral Candies: Take double damage from crushing towers, 1 health, drop one cash on crunch

  • Blue: has a yellow basic underneath and spawns a blue basic
  • Green:  has a blue spiral underneath and spawns a green basic
  • Red: has a green spiral underneath and spawns a red basic
  • Orange: has a red spiral underneath and spawns a orange basic
  • Purple: has an orange spiral underneath and spawns a purple basic
  • Cyan: has a purple spiral underneath and spawns a cyan basic
  • Yellow: has a cyan spiral underneath and spawns a yellow basic

Bosses:

  • candy cane johnson :)
  • THE GREEN GUMMY PRINCE
  • THE GREEN GUMMY PRINCE PART 2 (Now with johnsons on his wrist)
  • THE RED GUMMY QUEEN
  • THE CHOCO DROP LORD
  • THE YELLOW GUMMY KING
  • T H E  E T E R N A L  M I N T
